channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Energy -- LinkOne
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Energy -- LinkOne

item.title: CVE-2021-40337|2024-08-04T02:27:31.930Z -- hitachi%20energy -- linkone
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Hitachi Energy LinkOne allows an attacker that manages to exploit the vulnerability can take advantage to exploit multiple web attacks and stole sensitive information. This issue affects: Hitachi Energy LinkOne 3.20; 3.22; 3.23; 3.24; 3.25; 3.26.
